ygData.subject: Scourge/Maxi:  heart 2 heart
ygData.msgSnippet: Scourge placed a large hand on her shoulder. If i may can we talk in private. He had transformed back into a bot durring her talk on the communicater.

 Scourge placed a large hand on her shoulder. "If i may can we talk 
in private." He had transformed back into a bot durring her talk on 
the communicater. 
 
EmprzAnastazia [1:52 AM]:  Her crimson optics glanced at his hand 
upon her shoulder, then looked up at him, she had an interesting look 
on her face as to curious that anyone dared to touch her. 
"Very well. We shall talk." As shee turned & walked to the Bridge. 
She felt most comfortable there.
Accessing it as she stepped up to the door, touched a couple buttons, 
then the door slid open... she stepped inside..  

 FoxManRoar1 [1:54 AM]:  Scourge Followed feeling small... he once 
tore these doors from there frame, and killed the autobot Brawn with 
his bare hands... now he was a mouse scurring through its walls... 
 

EmprzAnastazia [1:56 AM]:  She strode over to a place where she could 
sit. T'was difficult to moved about with all the scattered parts. 
"What is it that you wish to talk about, Scourge?" Her voice close to 
that of her old form's voice, deep & sophisticated. The tone in her 
voice was serious, with a hint of curiousity & command to it.  
 
FoxManRoar1 [1:58 AM]:  Scourge stood and looked around. "I am here 
for three reasons, protect megatron, my father, to protect prime my 
brother, and to change time in favor of my future." I would like to 
know if you would aide me?" 
 
EmprzAnastazia [2:01 AM]:  The other 2 were interesting enough. But 
acceptable. The final one was very questionable. "Change time in YOUR 
favor?" Leaning back, her arms drapped over the armrests, "I'm 
afraid, I will do nothing of the sort unless you tell me WHAT in 
specific you are suggesting about, changing time in your favor." Her 
crimson optic gazed at him with serious curiousity.  
 
FoxManRoar1 [2:06 AM]:  "In the current time line Megatron is beat by 
prime and he sells out to become galvatron, he goes insane later and 
is destroyed..." 
 
EmprzAnastazia [2:07 AM]:  She tried not to wince at the pain that 
that caused. "I am well aware of that," she kept her voice under 
control as much as possible. 
 
FoxManRoar1 [2:08 AM]:  "I am from an alternate reality he thus 
created, instead of becoming galvatron he retreated from that battle 
and later created me." 
 
EmprzAnastazia [2:09 AM]:  She froze a moment. As she listened & 
tried her best to let it sink in. 'He created this form before her?' 
she thought. 
"Go on..."  
 
FoxManRoar1 [2:13 AM]:  "Megatron built me as a wepon, but in his 
death i became ruler of the decepticons, and soon ended the war of 
the transformers. Alas my time stream is unraveling, i have struck a 
deal with prime, protect the future no matter what, or my fate is 
worse then death." "I will do anything to make my reality the 
dominate, even if it means leading autobots." 
 
EmprzAnastazia [2:17 AM]:  She gazed at him with an alarm. She was so 
unsure of this. A reality that was changed? 
Her optics glanced over at Megatron. She dare not do anything. At 
this point in time, her form here was silent... but on Cybertron now, 
she would be doing much.. including hunting down the Autobot fembots, 
assasinations, etc.
"If the future is changed here, Scourge... then even Hydras would not 
be forged." She gazed at him hoping to arouse his curiousity in 
Hydras.  
 
FoxManRoar1 [2:19 AM]:  "Hydras?" He cocked his head and like prime, 
but stroked his chin and furrowed his brows like megatron... 
 
EmprzAnastazia [2:21 AM]:  She smirked, she did succeed there. "The 
final product of a complete merging of Megatron & Galvatron." her 
voice was reflecting the slight menece & joy of suc a possibility. 
Her crimson optics barely glowed as she mentioned both names.  
 
FoxManRoar1 [2:23 AM]:  Scourge looked at her for a second and shook 
his head. "Galvatron was powerful but unstable, the power and prssure 
made megatron go insane, with the two combined would he not be even 
more unstable?"  
 
EmprzAnastazia [2:25 AM]:  She shook his head. "Negative. I have seen 
him both in action & not. He's far more stable than I could have 
imagined. Let alone, powerful." she smirked slightly. It had been a 
while since she saw him. Already, her lasercore cried out to him. 
Begging to see him again. But, she subdued that emotion. A downfall 
of such a type of body.  
 
EmprzAnastazia [2:26 AM]:  "Are you willing to change a future that 
would cause major catastrophes & consequences?  
 EmprzAnastazia [2:26 AM]:  " 
 
FoxManRoar1 [2:30 AM]:  "Are you asking me to die so these pathetics 
bio bots can live? Do you not remember MY father despised orgainics!" 
He stood pulling out his cannon feeling the same hatred.... 
 
EmprzAnastazia [2:34 AM]:  She stood & moved up to him. "SO DO I! 
Think I ENJOY being stuck in this form?! Hmm?! Alpha Trion & Vector 
Sigma did this to me! I'm doing what I can to get back to my 
Cybertronian form." she then turned back around & stepped back over 
to the seat she was in, standing by it, turning back around to face 
him. "However, I will not nor cannot allow the future to be changed. 
If you change it now... who's to say, that you will exist in the 
future?"  

 FoxManRoar1 [2:38 AM]:  Scourge lowered his cannon. "I suppose 
theres no real way to ensure my future will come about." He sat 
thinking of what he was going to lose... he looked up at her. "I 
ended the war, i had peace in my iron grip, i ruled them all, but 
there was no death, i found our people a new home, we destroyed 
unicron and the black plague... my future..." He lowered his head... 
 
EmprzAnastazia [2:42 AM]:  She gazed at him. "In your reality, 
perhaps so. But.. this is .. different." she said the last word with 
a slight pain to it. 
"My devotion if to the Decepticon cause." pausing. "&.. to Megatron. 
I shall not deviate from what I must do. I am here.. to protect 
Megatron at all costs. I will not allow anything to happen. Destroy 
the current beasts if you will. I'm sure you will enjoy destroying 
Rodimus Prime & his Autobots & Maximals. Destroy the Predacon's for 
all I care. They give the ones I knew a bad ... 
 EmprzAnastazia [2:42 AM]:  reputation."  
 
FoxManRoar1 [2:45 AM]:  Scourge looked up. "You realize with 
megatrons personality, i have an advantage in life." "Think, if 
megatron was cornered, and he had no other thing to do what would he 
do?" 
 
EmprzAnastazia [2:47 AM]:  She gazed at him; trying not to think of 
it. 
Then glanced down, then looked up at the form that lay dormant 
nearby. 
For the moment, she was lost.  
 
FoxManRoar1 [2:50 AM]:  "My Father would have found some use in any 
situation."  
 
EmprzAnastazia [2:52 AM]:  'A use to his advantage, if not for the 
advantage of the Decepticons,' she thought. 
Still she remained silent.  
 
FoxManRoar1 [2:54 AM]:  Scourge was delighted... it had been years 
since he was truly able to be a true decepticon. He hugged her 
happily. "Yessss i can see it now, I'll rebuild from here with these 
autobots and who ever i force into my army i will recreate my future 
now..." He looked into her eyes. "We will make megatrons day of 
wakening a grande one. where he will awaken to his dream come true!"
